text:
e="preserve">Margo Rae Price (born April 15, 1983) is an American country singer-songwriter from Nashville, Tennessee. Her first solo studio album, "Midwest Farmer's Daughter", was released on Third Man Records on March 25, 2016.
Price received a nomination in December 2018 for Best New Artist at the 61st Annual Grammy Awards.
Price was born and raised in Aledo, Illinois.
